name: Dodge It! 2
description: JUMP, DODGE, DIE, REPEAT

name: Gaserb
description: Gaserb contains difficult puzzles that can be solvable by only clever ideas. Challenge the timer bar which can change how the game works and see if you're clever and fast enough to beat it.

name: Transformers: Battlegrounds - Complete Edition
description:
Bumblebee and the Autobots have a new commander - you. Assemble your squad and roll out for a battle that will rage from Central City to Cybertron. Choose heroes including Windblade and Optimus Prime, each with unique attacks and abilities. Use each environment to your advantage, taking cover in desert sandstorms and battling your foes in city streets. And charge your Energon to unleash devastating Ultimate Abilities. Then visit the Arcade for local multiplayer battles with the Decepticons and more. It’s the Tramsformers game you’ve waited an eternity for!

Transformers: Battlegrounds - Complete Edition includes:
- a copy of the base game
- Gold Autobot Skin Pack
- Energon Autobot Skin Pack
- Battle Autobot Skin Pack
- Neon Autobot Skin Pack
- Nemesis Prime & Goldfire Bumblebee Skin Pack
- CUBE Game - Arcade Add-on
- Transformers: Battlegrounds - Shattered Spacebridge

name: Pebble
description: 3D-Platformer where you play as Pebble who moves objects in time in search for his parents. Uncover the story by exploring new environments as you go on to find unique setpieces throughout the game.

name: Otome no Himitsu
description: Otome No Himitsu is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Cellar
description: A story-focused game about six strangers stuck together for a month, and a machine that must be kept running.

name: Avalanches
description: A cold top-down avalanches survival game. Can you sustain avalanches? You must survive to find a way to escape avalanche valley. Or live there, its up to you!

name: Rogue Tower
description: Rogue Tower is a tower defense game with roguelike elements and a continuously expanding path which you can influence. Unlock new towers and buildings, build up your defenses, upgrade your towers through card draws and cash, expand the path tactically to control how enemies move and defend your tower.

name: Sweet Collector
description: A cute 2D puzzle game with sweets and cakes that will make you relax! If you just want to have a bit of time for yourself. Arrange your 50 sweet friends on the grid of 100 levels.

name: Hentai Jigsaw Puzzle 2
description: Kawaii girls are broken into pieces. Can you reunite them by completing these jigsaw puzzles?

name: Nelson and the Magic Cauldron: The Journey
description: "Nelson and the Magic Cauldron: The Journey" is a classic point & click adventure, with lots of puzzles and funny dialogues.

name: Cyber Manhunt: Hello World
description: Senior researcher of Titan Dr. Lucrezia died in a terrible car accident on the spot, but the fellow Benjamin took escape from death with the important documents. Just when Benjamin began to investigate the truth of the death, he did not realize that he was about to be involved in a huge conspiracy…

name: I've Seen Everything
description: In the "I've Seen Everything" quiz, you will need to recognize what is being shown in the picture and choose the correct answer out of four options. There are several game modes: single-player mode with an AI, no opponent mode, and multiplayer mode (four players maximum).

name: Ancient Wars: Sparta Definitive Edition
description: One of the most innovative Real-Time Strategy Games comes back totally renewed and improved to the smallest detail, with epic large scale battles, new civilizations, unit customization system never seen before in a game, 8K support, and a lot of more.

name: SlingStar
description: SlingStar is a casual 2D Space puzzle adventure, journey your way across 3 galaxies in this relaxing experience!

name: Arghh, There's a Killer Chasing Me!
description: Arghh, There's a Killer Chasing Me! is a comedy survival horror game where you play as Adam who is being hunted by a killer in the woods. Your objective is to escape…preferably with your insides still on the inside.

name: When I Die
description: When I Die comes with a post-apocalyptic story line. The setting of the game originally took place in a facility. The player need to complete a role of a remaining survivor trapped in the building trying to escape from the people who have become zombies.

name: zeMa
description: Take a look at electronics from the inside. There are copper conductors, resistors, inductors, diodes and capacitors. This is a spherical maze. It is very easy to get lost. Let's get rid of all the foreign objects. Caution! High voltage!

name: Pyramids Slot Machines
description: Feel the ambience of Authentic casinos with this top-of-art Slot Machines on the theme of Ancient Egypt.

name: Red Conquer
description: Red Conquer is a strategic third-person shooter set in the second war on an alien planet

name: BallFrog
description:
Use fun and experimental controls to roll ball frog around awesome environments!
Use Ball Frogs tongue as a grappling hook to grab, swing and fling Ball Frog through the map! Check Points are used so you don't lose progress and will save your checkpoint for the next time you play.
Since this game uses physics a lot, we have many mechanics that can bounce, swing and even pop you as you play through the game.
The in game currency "Flies" can be collected throughout the game and can be spent in the shop to buy cosmetic hats and skins!

name: Blank Frame
description: Blank Frame is a first person surreal horror game with a look akin to early 2000's pc/ps2 games.. In the small town of Dim River, one resident, Henri, has found himself trapped inside of his own apartment, perhaps not completely by himself. The night is going to be long and peculiar.

name: Boulder Dash: Ultimate Collection
description: Boulder dash Ultimate Collection for the Nintendo Switch includes two Boulder Dash titles, the Boulder Dash 30th Anniversary and Boulder Dash Deluxe. The game features more than 400 newly designed levels across two games!

name: Uncharted: Legacy of Thieves Collection
description:
Uncharted: Legacy of Thieves Collection is a remastered collection of two games in the Uncharted saga: Uncharted 4: A Thief’s End and Uncharted: The Lost Legacy.

This includes multiple graphical options with varying framerates and resolutions, faster load times and DualSense haptic feedback and adaptive triggers.

name: Uncharted: The Lost Legacy - Remastered
description: A remastered version of Uncharted: The Lost Legacy included in the Uncharted: Legacy of Thieves Collection. It features multiple graphical options with varying framerates and resolutions, faster load times and DualSense haptic feedback and adaptive triggers.

name: Uncharted 4: A Thief's End - Remastered
description: A remastered version of Uncharted 4: A Thief's End included in the Uncharted: Legacy of Thieves Collection. It features multiple graphical options with varying framerates and resolutions, faster load times and DualSense haptic feedback and adaptive triggers.

name: Myth of Mist: Legacy
description: In the mist-surrounded City of Time and Eternity, you are the son of a noble family, going between various factions aiming to fight against the upcoming disaster of the Mist of Doomsday. This game is for players who love SLGs and multi-ending RPGs. Join us and write your own legend!

name: Bluravity
description: Bluravity is a 2D gravity platformer featuring a small block protagonist.

name: Re:Turn 2 - Runaway
description: Re:Turn 2 is a 2D psychological horror adventure game. The game follows on from the events of the first game. Saki and her fiancé, Sen, are trapped on an abandoned train that is haunted by an evil spirit that takes the form of a little girl named Ayumi.

name: Hyper-5
description: Hyper-5 is an indie cinematic shmup inspired by classics from the “golden era” of the 90’s.

name: Pokémon Legends: Arceus
description:
The Pokémon Legends: Arceus game honors past Pokémon games’ core gameplay while infusing new action and RPG elements.

You’ll need to catch, survey, and research wild Pokémon in a long-gone era of the Sinnoh region to create and complete the region’s first Pokédex.

name: Nienix
description: Search for the legendary lost artifact Nienix through galaxies in conflict! An open world sci-fi online multiplayer action RPG.

name: Kiss-iro
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic In Mario's Mind
description: Sin descripción

name: Nemo
description: A collection of picross puzzles for PICO-8.

name: Cogen: Sword of Rewind: Additional Story & Playable Character - Akasha
description:
This DLC pack adds the following content to Cogen: Sword of Rewind.

- Bonus Playable Character: Akasha
- Additional Story for Akasha
- New Stage: Extra 1-1
- New Stage: Extra 1-2 (Unlocked after beating Extra 1-1)
- New Stage: Extra 1-3 (Unlocked after beating Extra 1-2)

name: Devoid
description:
When a human moves into a new apartment, they decide to explore the area to meet their new neighbours. But they must be careful as the building is not all as it seems.
Devoid is a visual novel with point and click elements created in Ren'Py. Navigate through this building and meet your new neighbours. Be careful not to get trapped.

name: Those Infernal Girls!
description: After a strange light is seen in the deserts outside the town of Offal newbie herders Agatha and her girlfriend Margot embark on their first solo herding assignment to round up the infernals attracted by the light, but strange characters and even stranger creatures await them.

name: MistWorld the after2
description: Sin descripción

name: Battle Humanoid
description: Deck construction roguelike x tower defense! Let's go on an adventure while making your own deck!

name: Cogen: Sword of Rewind - Additional Story ＆ Yuji Otori
description: Cogen: Sword of Rewind - DLC Pack #2.

name: Seal of Evil
description: Seal of Evil is a mythical take on the tumultuous time marking the fall of the Zhou imperial dynasty. Out of this chaos emerges an uncompromising ruler, Ying Zheng, who has vowed to either unify China or bury it in fire.

name: Lost Recipes
description: In Lost Recipes, you are a Ghost Chef in training. You will cook for ghosts from Greek, Chinese, and Maya civilizations who long to pass on the traditional recipes of their favorite dishes. Recreate authentic food from three historic cultures in this relaxing cooking game.

name: Bright Memory Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: My Hero One's Justice 2: Pack 8 Kurogiri
description: Play as Kurogiri in My Hero One's Justice 2! This pack also includes 10 color variations for Kurogiri's costume.

name: Prison Architect: Perfect Storm
description: There's a storm coming, Wardens! Prison Architect: Perfect Storm makes it rain with grants, emergency services, staff training, and Calamities.

name: Arcade Archives: Pistol Daimyo no Bouken
description: Pistol Daimyo no Bouken is a shooter released by Namco in 1990. Players control the young lord Pistol Daimyo on an adventure as he battles, spirits and evildoers. His energy bullets have 3 tiers of strength, determined by how long you hold the button. Use helpful items you find along the way and triumph over the enemies before you!

name: Shadow Samurai Revenge
description:
Arashi's son was kidnapped, and his wife was killed by an evil demon called Orochi. Last 10 years Orochi was sealed away by Arashi, but now Arashi has to take his Revenge and try to rescue his son.
The game needs strategic thinking and memorizing with extra focus on avoiding traps. It has numerous levels to go through, each with its fair share of challenges and demanding situations.

name: Zodiac Tri Peaks Solitaire
description: Play Tri-Peaks Solitaire with a Zodiac Theme. Win progressive play to unlock new card themes and backgrounds, or play just the classic game to kill time.

name: Jumping Quest
description: Jumping Quest is a game where you need to jump and push people off the platform as quickly as possible. The problem is that every platform can disappear randomly, not to mention other players will try to push you off the ledge as well. That's where Jumping Quest is the most impressive, because it requires you to time your approach and test your skills as much as you can. It's an incredible opportunity and the gameplay itself is nothing short of amazing. Do you have what it takes to beat your enemies and push your skills to the next level?

name: Colors and Numbers
description: Coloring fun cartoons, mandalas or other joyful pictures. Have a relaxing and joyful experience with Colors and Numbers by coloring pictures in a simple and easy way! Colors and Numbers is a digital coloring book where you color different pictures by choosing the right numbered color and touch the corresponding numbered section on the picture.

name: Blaster Alert
description: A classic old-school shooter with the possibility of upgrading your own spaceship.

name: Heroic Pirates
description: Heroic Pirates puts you in the shoes of a pirate commander and you need to use your pirate team cleverly in order to survive everything that comes your way. The game map features multiple levels that you need to complete until you uncover the treasure. This is not a walk in the park, but it’s one of the most exhilarating and enticing game experiences that you will ever have. Test it out for yourself and you will have fun playing with the pirates as you reach the end and uncover the reassure. You can also recruit pirates along the way and enlarge your team! Features: Exhilarating pirate gameplay Recruit more pirates to join your team Follow a beautiful pirate map

name: Zoo Seeker
description: Zoo Seeker is a hidden object game set in a fantasy world. Help the cats fix the mess they have caused by traveling to each world and finding the slimes hidden there.

name: Redemption Cemetery: Dead Park - Collector's Edition
description: Can you help three souls escape a deadly amusement park?

name: Turn off the light
description: A gloomy platformer in which you have to get out of the desperate consciousness of the main character. The unique ambient and minimalistic graphics will create a tense atmosphere. Explore the game space and avoid all its aggressive inhabitants.

name: Steamed Hams: The Graphic Adventure
description:
You've invited Superintendent Chalmers over for lunch! He'll be here any second and is expecting a well cooked roast!

Fortunately, you have been preparing just such a roast all morning! Hopefully you don't accidentally burn it and set certain events into motion...

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: The Drum Master!
description:
Drum out high scores by accurately playing along with 2 different notes, Don and Ka, in Taiko no Tatsujin: The Drum Master! Includes over 70 songs, local multiplayer mode, and online ranked matches.
Light your drumming spirit on fire!

name: The Mourning Star
description:
Wield the last Star as a cosmic flail in this existential action game.

In a dying universe, a ghostly figure with amnesia finds themselves with the power to restore everything. Wielding the final star they perform a perilous ritual to bring about another Big Bang. Over countless cycles Deah learns about life, death, and their true nature.

name: Fantasy Mosaics 35: Day at the Museum
description: Enjoy the challenge of Zen mosaic puzzles, explore the museum and discover fun mini games! The gameplay features secret colors. All puzzles are based on logic.

name: 多宝修仙
description: This is a turn-based strategy immortal cultivation game, where you can subdue spiritual pets from all walks of life, refine exclusive magic weapons, and meet immortals and Taoists. My cultivation is my master!

name: City Retreat
description: Shoot zombies! Find new weapons! Unlock new characters and cars, arrive at the airport and escape!

name: The Augury House
description: The Augury House is a shifting collection of short experiences and exhibitions. Contents change weekly.

name: Knight's Try
description: Knight's Try is a tough platformer with retro 64 bit 3D graphics. Take on the role of an honorable Knight of Trye attempting to complete their sacred pilgrimage by leaping through a world full of perilous pitfalls and dangerous traps!

name: Exploria
description: An adventurous RPG with a variety of different equipments and great sceneries.

name: Crush Crush
description: Hey hot stuff! Are you looking for a fun and flirty game to kill some time and make you laugh out loud? That’s a crazy coincidence, because it’s been looking for you too! Welcome to Crush Crush – the Idle Dating Sim! Begin your quest to win the hearts of your town's lovely ladies... after a few disastrous intros! Impress the girls by building your stats, unlocking jobs, and earning promotions. Woo them with romantic dates, thoughtful gifts, and a tickle fight or two! Work your way up from Frenemy to Lover, and unlock tons of amazing content along the way.

name: Drawer
description: An arcade racing game with indirect controls. Take on the role rally car co-pilot, when the pilot himself isn’t there O_O Develop your spatial thinking and fine motor skills, beat other players’ records and, most importantly, have fun!

name: Cat and Fish
description: You are a brave cat who got lost in the forest in search of food. You have to collect all the food, while getting out of the forest alive. Be careful, because the forest is full of various traps and obstacles!

name: Jentrix
description:
Meet Jentrix! This game was inspired by the famous board game and combines the very best of Jenga, match-3 and Tetris. And it’s all packed in Virtual Reality!

We are pretty sure you know the classic Jenga, but what if instead of wooden blocks there would be colorful fruit cubes, the towers would grow every second, and crocodiles would try to bite your hands?

Jentrix mixes different sets of mechanics from everyone’s favorite games. Jenga provides its well-known look of the tower and tests your physical and mental skills. Match-3 brings its popular 3-in-a-row portion, while Tetris vibes will put you to the edge as the tower grows.

The game has 4 modes: Company with 40+ levels on different locations, Arcade with endless gameplay and leaderboards, Table Top with mini Jenga that you can enjoy while sitting, and Multiplayer to play with your friends or random opponents.

name: Levitation Simulator
description: Levitation Simulator is a game where you can experience levitation.

name: Gunvolt Chronicles: Luminous Avenger iX 2 - Limited Edition
description:
Gunvolt Chronicles: Luminous Avenger iX 2 is the direct sequel to Gunvolt Chronicles: Luminous Avenger iX! This new game takes the original speedy and stylish 2D action gameplay to the next level as Copen rips through enemies with his new "Break-Shift" form. His new destructive capabilities makes the high-speed action more satisfying than ever! Experience a new apex of cutting-edge 2D action with Luminous Avenger iX 2!
This edition includes the following:

- Gunvolt Chronicles: Luminous Avenger iX 2
- Strategy Guide
- Lola Vocal CD
- Music Video Clip DVD

name: Pandemic Shooter
description: Run, gun, and have lots of fun in this action-packed first-person zombie shooter.

name: Rugby 22
description:
Take control of the biggest clubs and top rugby nations, and enter the most prestigious competitions in single-player and multiplayer modes, local and online.

Rugby 22 offers total rugby, combining tactics and intensity through gameplay that stays true to the sport.

name: Star Melody: Yumemi Dreamer - Limited Edition
description:
Star Melody: Yumemi Dreamer is a rhythm video game / visual novel developed and published by Kogado Studio.

The Limited Edition includes:
- The game
- 48 page Artbook
- Original soundtrack
- Limited Edition packaging

name: Cadavers for Dinner
description:
Boukenmeshi features character designs from Takehito Harada. Harada is character designer for the Disgaea franchise, as well as Labyrinth of Refrain and The Witch and the Hundred Knights. Players will gather food and materials from the dungeon as they go, cooking new, weird, and delicious dishes to improve their stats and grow stronger.

The game will incorporate a character generation feature, and involve a party of four characters. Various jobs are available to the party. These include Swordsman, Cook (who can improve the quality and diversity of rations), and even the “Unemployed” Job, which sounds like a Dark Souls-style Deprived character.

Boukenmeshi will also involve survival-game mechanics. This will involve managing the party’s calorie and water intake. Players can cook food while in camp, but also eat ingredients while fighting in strategic battles. These confer status effects and benefits from the consumption.

name: Magatsu Barai
description: Magatsu Barai is an all ages battle visual novel from the game brand Light. It will focus not only on serious battles, but also on depicting exhilarating, intense, and enjoyable battle stories.

name: Glass Hime to Kagami no Juusha: Limited Edition
description:
The Complete Limited Edition includes:
- Glass Hime to Kagami no Juusha
- Acrylic ornament
- Official soundtrack / Vocal song CD
- Lycee Overture PR card

name: Glass Hime to Kagami no Juusha
description:
Royal Sand Lyon Academy.

The main character, Shunsuke Takida, entered the retinue department in order to fulfill a certain promise.

In the retinue department, there is an extracurricular activity to accompany and take care of the students of the royal department, and take care of various princesses ....

Shunsuke, who had a problem on the day of the entrance ceremony, was in danger of repeating a grade in just half a year.

With the help of many, Shunsuke aims to become a full-fledged servant.

name: Strawberry Nauts: Complete Limited Edition
description:
Box contents:
- Game: Strawberry Nauts
- B2 tapestry
- Acrylic figure
- Original soundtrack

name: CardMaker
description: This is a Rogue + Hearthstone like card game, but also a card making tool, you can play in addition to the official cards, creative workshop players a variety of card DIY.

name: Gunvolt Chronicles: Luminous Avenger iX 2
description: Gunvolt Chronicles: Luminous Avenger iX 2 is the direct sequel to Gunvolt Chronicles: Luminous Avenger iX! This new game takes the original speedy and stylish 2D action gameplay to the next level as Copen rips through enemies with his new "Break-Shift" form. His new destructive capabilities makes the high-speed action more satisfying than ever! Experience a new apex of cutting-edge 2D action with Luminous Avenger iX 2!

name: Kamigami no Asobi Ludere Deorum: Unite Edition
description:
Gods are an existence that must hold love for humans and be worshiped by humans.

Kusanagi Yui, the daughter of a Shinto shrine, happens upon a mysterious sword in her cellar one spring day. The sword's power throws her into an unknown world, and it is here she encounters Zeus, the chief god of Greek mythology.

He informs her that the weak bond between gods and humans is causing a negative impact on the world. To fix this phenomenon, Zeus wants her to go to a school in a garden world he created, live together with the problematic gods, and teach them about what humans are and the meaning of love.

name: hexceed: Clavis Pack
description: The fourth addition to hexceed, bringing 110 exciting new levels! This world includes the Rotating Tile mechanic that was introduced in Animo!

name: Operation Steel
description: Operation Steel is a roguelike shoot-em-up rendered in beautiful hand-drawn art. Blow up loads of enemies, destroy huge bosses, find weapons, and upgrade your load-out between levels. Combat the electronic legion across 20+ procedurally generated levels!

name: Zenith: The Last City
description: Fight, craft, explore, and lose yourself in a massively multiplayer world built for VR. Forge alliances and friendships in guilds and parties. Join epic raids and world events, and blaze your own path. How will you use your power?

name: Monster Showdown
description: Monster Showdown is an action packed VR shooter. Increase your chances of survival against an ever growing horde of monster by exploring your environment and strengthening yourself by picking up Perks, Ranged Weapons and Melee Weapons.

name: Wanderer
description: Built from the ground up for VR, Wanderer has a unique blend of escape room style puzzles, tactile hands on interactions and action arcade sequences to bring you the ultimate time travel adventure. Are you ready to walk in the footsteps of those who have gone before you?

name: DCS World: NS 430 Navigation System for SA342 Gazelle by Eagle Dynamics, Polychop Simulations
description: The NS 430 for the SA342 Gazelle module integrates the NS 430 panel directly into the SA342 Gazelle cockpit (not as a pop-up display).

name: Hopeful Day Inside Room
description: Right after moving to a big city and getting a new apartment, you were fired from your job! And now you don't want to go outside again! Improve your skills, manage your time and find a way to make money without having to leave the room! Watch as your plans go down the drain and you sleep through the whole week!

name: Pokémon Fire Red Extended
description:
All Pokémon from the first to the eighth generation are available for capture!
This project is recommended to people who have never had the opportunity to play Pokémon before.
Some people know Pokémon anime, so this project is an excellent choice to be the first experience for this public target.
As I said before, our journey will only be in Kanto.
Unlike Pokémon Fire Red vanilla, the players don't have access to the seven islands.

name: Casey Taylor: Ace Attorney
description:
Casey Taylor: Ace Attorney is set around 20 years after Spirit of Justice,
and it is a story about a recently graduated attorney who had just founded his own law firm with his grandfather.
His expertise for the moment is civil lawsuits, but he will come to learn that some insignificant looking cases can hide the biggest conspiracies.

name: Pokémath!
description: Pokémath! is an educational math game based on the Pokémon series. The game features 5 levels, which increases the difficulty of the questions per level. After each level, you gain a new Pokémon.

name: 3D Puzzle: Old House
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful house

name: HexoJago
description: Singleplayer Story RPG Action Game

name: Poly Memory: Dogs
description: Cute, relaxing, polygonal memory game with dogs.

name: Galaga & Galaxian DX
description: A patch for Galaga & Galaxian to make it work with the Gameboy Color.

name: Minecraft: The World Warrior
description: Master the Hadouken and conquer the dark Hadou with this Capcom approved skin pack! Select your character from 35 classic world warriors and fighters like Ryu, Ken, Chun Li, and more.

name: Cogen: Sword of Rewind - Additional Story & Playable Character: Copen (Gunvolt Chronicles: Luminous Avenger iX 2)
description:
This DLC pack adds the following content to Cogen: Sword of Rewind.

- Bonus Playable Character: Copen (Gunvolt Chronicles: Luminous Avenger iX 2)
- Additional Story for Copen
- New Stage: Extra 3-1
- New Stage: Extra 3-2 (Unlocked after beating Extra 3-1)
- New Stage: Extra 3-3 (Unlocked after beating Extra 3-2)

name: Love Island: The Game - Season 4
description: The fourth season (also known as Bombshell) of Love Island: The Game was released on January 26, 2022. Volumes were made available weekly, with the final one being released on May 25, 2022.

name: 2X
description: Sin descripción

name: My Candy Love: Alternate Life
description:
What if your last year at Anteros Academy happened differently? And what if your first love was still in Amoris?

My Candy Love: Alternate Life is the fourth ongoing season of My Candy Love, being a series of retellings of University Life, with individual stories and romances following Candy's relationships with Lysander, Kentin, and Armin respectively.

name: A Drunk Man Looks at the Thistle Decoded
description: Come read this Scottish poem from 1926.

name: Globle
description: Every day, there is a new Mystery Country. Your goal is to guess the mystery country using the fewest number of guesses. Each incorrect guess will appear on the globe with a colour indicating how close it is to the Mystery Country. The hotter the colour, the closer you are to the answer.

name: Simple Idel
description: An idle game where your goal is to beat the game and click your way through oblivion. Get upgrades to boost your cps and money generation, while becoming a clicker god.

name: Hatsune Miku Connecting Puzzle Tamagotori
description: Connect eggs to clear and solve puzzles! Connect eggs with the same patterns with a line that bends twice or less to clear them. Clear all the eggs to complete the stage! Look across the entire board to find eggs to clear! Completing a puzzle will flip one illustration panel. Flip all of the panels to reveal the illustration!

name: Chain Cube
description: Sin descripción

name: Rorys Restaurant Origins
description: Help our sweet Rory in this hidden object game to get through Culinary School! Find cooking ingredients to cook over 30 delicious dishes from all over the world and serve customers to receive tips and upgrade your restaurant.

name: Gekko: Episode of Minato
description: On the stage where swords, machines and ponytails appear in modern society A school romantic comedy visual novel where you can enjoy exciting and exciting love patterns This is the first in the moonlight series. A cool and stoic girl in this work, You can enjoy Minato's love story.

name: Downfall of Krynto
description: An Old-School Retro RPG with Turn-Based Battles and lots of exploration and puzzle-solving.Mixed with a Dark Story about a Land very close to its Downfall!You can team up to be four friends taking on the Evil Darkness in Local co-op play anywhere!

name: Round Invaders
description: Round Invaders is an action arcade game with a fresh take on the famous Invaders arcade. Now the enemies come in circles, rays and ovals! Enjoy the plopping sounds while saving the Earth and rising your Score.

name: Go! Go! PogoGirl
description: Jump on your pogo stick and bounce, bounce, bounce! Go! Go! PogoGirl is a dynamic, cute and wholesome platformer about a girl and her pogo stick. Bounce your way through the world, collect gems and then bounce some more!

name: BlitzPunch
description: BlitzPunch is a unique VR boxing game where your punches shoot lightning!

name: Card Escape: Plane Crash
description: There was a disaster, your plane crashed into the very center of the forest. And now we need to get out healthy. You will find a lot of cards with different effects, both negative and positive. Survive...

name: Bombagun
description: A deceptively simple, post-apocalyptic style card game that you can play both online and offline!

name: Mini Mini-Golf
description: Mini Mini-Golf is a minimalistic game about golf in the casual genre.

name: Van Van Up!
description: Choose the van and let the adventure begins right now!

name: Mess Adventures 2
description: This abnormal game remains the previous nonsensical style, and it would be the best choice for teasing your friends, live broadcast, or even entertain yourself...

name: Gav-Gav Odyssey
description: Three space friends get into an unearthly adventure in which they face a variety of different tasks, which will take a lot of time to solve. Will you be able to exit the game as winners? Then be patient because the game is for those who like to think.

name: Elasto Mania: Remastered
description:
A NOT TOO CASUAL BIKE GAME Elasto Mania (commonly known as Elma) is an indie motorbike simulation game, a colorful 2D racing experience first released in 2000 as a successor to Action SuperCross. The remastered version is bigger & better than the original - the definitive way to play. This gem is challenging to master, but you will quickly get the hang of it, once you start playing!

A NEVERENDING EXPERIENCE There is always something new to discover when it comes to this beloved enduro platformer. When you think you have completed all the levels and collected all the goodies, it’s time to go online and compete on the leaderboards, or play together with a friend for a new perspective on old levels. And don’t worry, you won’t run out of content - there are more than a hundred additional levels in this version, with even more on the way.

A CULT CLASSIC The days of floppy disks, CRT monitors and dial-up internet are long gone, but our old school favorite outlived them all - and it’s still going strong. A lot has happened in the past two decades, but this fully formed cult classic is still the same “hard, but casual, but hard” retro game we all love. Play it now in its best form!

name: Froggy Crossing
description: Help Froggy the frog fill his belly with yummy coins! But be carrefull, you'll have to cross roads full of danger... Get new characters to play with using your collected coins. Have fun!

name: PopSlinger
description: PopSlinger is a vibrant, narrative-focused musical shooter inspired by ‘80s and ‘90s New Retro culture. Join Ria Carbon, a funky heroine on a stylish quest to save the world from sinister invaders from another dimension using soda-powered guns. Backing Ria up is former PopSlinger heroine, Gin! Experience the whimsical story of Ria and Gin as they fight against the "Corazones", people whose hearts have been corrupted by the dark forces from the other dimension, all while grooving to a fully dynamic soundtrack that reacts to your in-game performance in real-time.

name: Cogen: Sword of Rewind - Limited Edition
description:
Rewind, rethink, redo. Cogen is a brand-new kind of 2D action game where there's no time for death. Any hit you take is a death sentence in this side-scrolling 2D action game. But fear not! You may lack the HP to weather a beating, but you've got the Ouroboros System on your side. This futuristic technology kicks in the instant death embraces you and allows you to rewind up to 3 seconds of time. Slip up and wish you could take it back? Want to play around and experiment? Easy, just rewind the clock! Hone your skills through trial and error, and triumph over diabolical traps and legions of fearsome foes!

Cogen: Sword of Rewind - Limited Edition includes:
- Base game: Cogen: Sword of Rewind
- Luxury artbook
- Voice drama & mini soundtrack CD
- DLC: "Additional scenario & playable character: Akasha version"

name: Logic Light
description: A minimalist puzzle experience to restore the electricity of the houses after a blackout

name: Playback Trauma: The Beach
description: After a long and harrowing day, you have come to the beach to unwind. Something is different about tonight though. It's just the beach, there's nothing out there. Right?

name: Terra Ventura
description: Terra Ventura is an isometric action-adventure RPG set in a fantasy world, where you find yourself alone, shipwrecked and crew missing. Select and develop your character and immerse yourself in an adventure.

name: Please, Touch the Artwork
description: What happens when you DO touch the artwork? Part Zen-puzzle, part narrative-adventure, you'll unravel the secret world behind iconic abstract paintings through over 160 puzzles. An aesthetic journey to the origins of modern art, set to a soothing jazzy soundtrack.

name: Cogen: Sword of Rewind
description: Rewind, rethink, redo. Cogen is a brand-new kind of 2D action game where there's no time for death. Any hit you take is a death sentence in this side-scrolling 2D action game. But fear not! You may lack the HP to weather a beating, but you've got the Ouroboros System on your side. This futuristic technology kicks in the instant death embraces you and allows you to rewind up to 3 seconds of time. Slip up and wish you could take it back? Want to play around and experiment? Easy, just rewind the clock! Hone your skills through trial and error, and triumph over diabolical traps and legions of fearsome foes!

name: Bloody Spell
description: "Bloody Spell" is a martial arts action role-playing game. The core of the game is battle-oriented, and it combines many fighting elements and systems.

developers.name: Yi Long Games ( 艺龙游戏 )

name: Offside
description: “Offside!” is a romantic-comedy sports-thriller Visual Novel where you step into the shoes of Alex Strider, an ex-footballer turned private investigator who uses his unique experience combined with a very peculiar (and oftentimes hilarious) way of finding out the truth.

name: Scarab of Ra
description: Explore the mazes of the Great Pyramid of Ra! Each level is a new, larger, random maze to solve. Find tools and supplies abandoned by earlier, failed expeditions, try to avoid the traps, and encounter dangerous animals and the fearsome Guardians as you seek the three sacred Talismans of Ra the Sun-God. This faithful, retro-styled recreation of the original shareware classic from 1987 also offers optional new game features including new tools and hazards, and controls that allow you to tone down Animal Ferocity and the dangers of traps to suit your preference.

name: Foryster
description: Sin descripción

name: Wloku
description: Sin descripción

name: Raccoon Laundering
description: Based on keywords washing, raccoon, and tanuki leaf, using bipsi, a bitsy-like tool developed by candle.

name: Znake
description: Sin descripción

name: Near
description:
Shiina is an aspiring manga artist.
He's been drawing for fun for a long time, but his efforts just wouldn't pay off.
Just as he was about to stop, he remembered he had a fan.
Near, a boy so beautiful he might as well not have been real.

name: Cities: Skylines - Content Creator Pack: Map Pack
description: Cities: Skylines - Content Creator Pack: Map Pack features 8 new maps by "Sanctum Gamer", where you can unleash your creativity and plan new metropolises.

name: Cities: Skylines - Content Creator Pack: Vehicles of the World
description: A set of 21 new vehicle assets from around the globe, brought to you by "bsquiklehausen". Fill the streets of your cities with iconic service vehicles, like a Police Supercar and more!

name: Cities: Skylines - On Air Radio
description: Cool cats rejoice, "On Air Radio" brings jazz beats to Cities: Skylines. Ideal for building the smoothest cities around. Tune in right now!

name: Cities: Skylines - Calm the Mind Radio
description: City-building got you stressed? Tune that dial to Calm the Mind Radio, the second relaxation station in the game, to bring some chill vibes into your architectural workflow.

name: Scout
description:
Scout is the ambitious son of a well known adventurer. His father explored lost places and donated any treasures he found to let the world see it. However, there had been one treasure he never managed to locate and retrieve: The golden hazelnut of an ancient squirrel temple. Everything he found out about it had been written down in his diary which Scout years later recovered and further researched and eventually located the temple. Now he needs your help to explore the it's secrets and show the world his father's life's work!

'Scout' is a short and compact, atmospheric adventure game, mainly focusing on creating a harmonic environment and nice, simple graphics rather than complex gameplay and features. The goal is to encourage the player to take their time while playing, stop occasionally and just have a look around instead of rushing through it, while still enjoying this ride!

name: Cities: Skylines - Airports
description: The Airports expansion allows you to build your own airport areas, set up gates and connect them via concourse networks. Design your dream airports, from small airfields to large international hubs.

name: DJMax Respect V: V Extension II Pack
description: DJMAX RESPECT V - V EXTENSION II DLC!! Meet the 'V Original Music' package now!

name: Feverfew
description: Two bastards beat the shit out of each other and kiss kiss fall in love. Or maybe not.

name: Nope Nope Nurses
description:
Hospital ≠ hospitality...?!
Yamada is afflicted with a rare condition that makes his life hard, and when he manages to break bones in both his hands too, he ends up on a medical bed with beautiful nurses tending to his every need.
Make no mistake, though—these nurses are vicious and no love sparks fly… Will young Yamada leave the hospital with his sanity intact?

name: Larry: Wet Dreams Dry Twice
description: Larry: Wet Dreams Dry Twice is the mobile port of Leisure Suit Larry: Wet Dreams Dry Twice!

name: Octordle
description: A daily word guessing game, where players have 13 guesses to discover 8 mystery words. Also includes a free-play mode.

name: Haha Doodle
description:
Play drawing games online with your friends, for FREE!
You can choose to play a drawing game from a variety of options, such as:
* Guess what others are drawing
* Broken telephone, but with drawings
* Draw images with limitations, such as random colors
* And many more!

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate: Lunar New Year
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Bunny Raiders
description: Sin descripción

name: Artists of Fortune: Paint by Numbers! - Neue Voyager Ep. 5
description: Artists have been invited to take part in the New Voyager project!

name: Boxing Club Manager
description: You've waited long enough. Boxing management is now in your gloves. Winning fights is your goal. Running the best gym is your future. Take control. Train and steer your boxers to glory in the ring! Build up your gym, make it World class!

name: 第一千零二夜的童话
description: 漫无目的的都市、永无止境的日常。 这里没有超现实的人和事物，有的只是青春期的少年少女们上演的日常与非日常。 没有一件东西比现实更沉重，也没有一件东西比爱更深奥。 但问题是，你能爱上那个不完美、不梦幻、甚至满身疮痍的对象吗？ 你能爱上你自己吗？

name: The Late D. Flate's Great Estate
description: Venture into the great estate of the late D. Flate as you help the estranged son of this world-renowned adventurer recover his inheritance. Tackle 70 fiendishly funny, balloon bursting physics puzzles by floating D. Flate's priceless artifacts through the perilous rooms of his mysterious manor.

name: Mystery of Fortune 2 Refine
description: Explore dungeons with your own army and try to make the most efficient corps.

name: Connected Hearts: The Full Moon Curse - Collector's Edition
description: A humble healer is accused of witchcraft and hunted while her beloved is infected and will become a werewolf soon. Can this unlucky couple withstand the storm and achieve happiness together? Play the game and find out!

name: Samurai Tactics
description: Samurai Tactics is a roguelike SRPG with a samurai theme. Hire samurai of various professions with the motif of the 10 Sanada warriors and the 12 zodiac signs. Hear their stories and join the journey to save the Sanada family. Become the leader of a samurai party in a party of 1-4, save Sanada Yukimura, the ill-fated general of the Sanada clan, and lead a new history.

name: Dangerous Hobby
description: "Dangerous Hobby" is a classic side-scrolling 2D platformer game, the goal of which is to overcome obstacles to complete levels of varying difficulty. Spikes, saws, flying projectiles, moving platforms and much more await to finish you off.

name: The VII Enigma
description: Fate, love, death... Can the enigma be solved? The VII Enigmais a character-driven sci-fi mystery visual novel. Set in a shadowy world of dystopian conspiracy, you must defy the fabric of reality, navigating the desperate path to the 'true end' against the tyranny of time itself.

name: Jumpilla
description: An auto-runner controlled by a single mouse click. All levels are designed carefully by the developer and played many times. They can get quite tricky to pass and are not repetitive or boring. Real fun to dodge the rocks, fires and holes to get to your target.

name: Serious Sam: Siberian Mayhem
description: Serious Sam: Siberian Mayhem is a new stand-alone expansion to the world of the classic FPS series. Join the fight against Notorious Mental on a journey through the wild lands of Russia, and find your way through this lost chapter of Sam Stone's adventures.

name: Craterbound
description: Crash-land onto a unique and hostile alien world and begin your fight to survive. Face its inhabitants, upgrade your technology, create outposts & bases, and find a way to repair your ship. Explore the beautifully strange terrain, all while blasting and crafting your way off of the planet.

name: Death's Gambit: Afterlife - Definitive Edition
description:
The Definitive Edition includes:
- Physical copy of the game
- Illustrated inner coversheet
- Vinyl sticker sheet – set of 9 unique stickers
- Double-sided poster

name: Broken Ranks
description: In this brutal world, filled with the clash of weapons and roars of powerful, dark creatures, many heroes fell and their names were cast into oblivion. Use your chance. Show your mettle and aid others in their quest for glory. Together with your friends, unite the broken ranks against your enemies in one of the most fascinating MMORPGs of this generation.

name: Idle TD: Heroes vs Zombies
description: An endless Tower Defense game of epic heroes vs evil zombies. Unlock and upgrade countless Heroes, artifacts, and technologies to defend against the infinite zombie swarms. Strategize the most effective placement of Heroes to synergize their skills and abilities.

name: The Demon Lord is New in Town!
description: A Resource Management Adventure Game -- Play as Vaan, a demon lord who has had his power sealed, and has been banished to the world of mortals. Make friends and work towards regaining your former glory!

name: Reverie Knights Tactics
description: Reverie Knights Tactics is a turn-based tactical RPG with strategic battles in isometric grids where every decision can alter the story. Travel through a hand-drawn fantasy world and lead your heroes in a story-rich adventure, visual novel style!

name: Kapia
description: An adventure of a small girl and her grandfather in a funky apocalyptic world of Kapia. Solve puzzles, play mini-games, interact with eccentric characters to unveil the mystery of the Kapia

name: Mortal Online 2
description: Mortal Online 2 is the long awaited sequel to Star Vault’s long running first person sandbox MMORPG. Explore a massive open sandbox world and choose your own path, but be aware, danger lurks around every corner in this full PvP full loot world.

name: Not for Broadcast
description: Not For Broadcast is an immersive, narrative-driven propaganda sim set in the control room of a TV Studio in a 1980’s dystopia. Control what the people see and what they don't as the government tightens its grip. Will you censor the news and be rewarded, or fight for the truth and live with the consequences?

name: Reach the core
description: In this free online digging game you play for a Commander of a spaceship stuck in the galaxy outskirts. Luckily, the screening of a nearby planet showed some plasma required for your next space jump. Control your miner with arrow keys of your finger as you play free online on your tablet or mobile phone. Collect resources and buy upgrades to enhance resistance and capacity of the miner battery before starting next day. Dig the ground in this free online arcade game for kids and make your way back home.

name: Baroque: Become a Meta-Being
description:
The world collapsed due to the unprecedented disaster "Great Heat".
In this distorted world, people couldn't keep their shape as human beings.

You noticed that you became a Meta-Being "Grue"
and wandered around the distorted and ever-changing "Neuro Tower".

name: Micro Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: Blobby's Adventure
description: It's your virtual pet Blobby's adventure! Guide him through the virtual world until he reaches the castle in the sky. Defeat the castle boss to win the game. Collect hearts to refill your health.

name: Invisible Places: Pixel Art Jigsaw Puzzle
description: Invisible Places is a minimalist jigsaw puzzle game that mixes GIF Pixel Art and photographs instead of static images.

name: Furry Boys Jigsaw
description: Be a good girl, or boy, and enjoy this puzzle game with sexy furries boys.

name: Monstrosity
description:
It's a brand new day and you're in charge of the facilities new monstrosity!

Take good care of it and make sure to write everything down you observe, your job and your life depends on it!

name: Paperquarium
description: Paperquarium is the result of magic and the desire of your doodly fishes becoming alive. It gives you the chance to take care of your own virtual, doodly fish pets, to see them grow and interact on real timescale!

name: King of Defense 2: Epic TD
description:
The sequel to King of Defense: Battle Frontier is King of Defense 2: Epic Tower Defense. New heroes, turrets, and invaders will debut in this sequel, which creates epic battles. The combination of turrets, which is the essential value of King of Defense, stays unchanged. In addition, heroes with excellent combat skills will aid in the defeat of the invaders.
The key to protecting the kingdom from aggressive monsters is strategy. Each must develop their own distinct and unique tactics to firmly defend the peaceful land.
Role-play as heroes in battles to gather power and awaken the potential within your heroes. Gather the necessary equipment, which includes spells, powers, techniques and tactics, to aid in preventing enemy attacks.
Go on adventures and explore the world of frozen lands, scorching deserts, land of the gods, and charming kingdoms hidden in the woods. All of those lands are waiting for you to arrive and defend them from the onslaught of ferocious monsters.
Let's fight it out in King of Defense to become a legendary hero.

name: Kronii is Hungry
description: Kronii is Hungry is a fanmade visual novel featuring sixteen hololive members, in which you can interact with them, present them with items, take lessons to increase your status, and more.

name: Twordle
description: This game lets streamers play Wordle with their chat.

name: Knights & Guns: Extended Edition
description: Knights & Guns: Extended Edition is a digital bundle that contains the base game and Expansion Pack #1 which adds 10 new levels, five new armors and new enemies for that extra little kick.

name: Trident Temple
description: Trident Temple is a 2 button rougelite where players must fight off waves of enemies with a trident.

name: Pwnk
description: Pwnk has a wide variety of community games to engage your live audiences and grow your stream. Create your live game show using Pwnk's mini-game battle royale! Your audiences will be able to play with you in real-time, create funny content, and even help you battle against other streamers!

name: Punchman
description: Punchman is a simple 1 versus 1 fighting platforming game featuring a set of different characters, power-ups, and levels.

name: Mutant
description: Mutant is a game featuring 15 huge levels and nine mutant special abilities. Hold up to four guns at once. Beat your enemy with crates, barrels, or cars.

name: Jigsaw Classics
description: Jigsaw Classics puzzles are created using famous paintings. Included are six 84 pieces puzzles. Unwind, play, and enjoy the classical music. All paintings and music are in public domain.

name: Storyblocks: The King
description: Storyblocks is a storytelling puzzle game. Short and peaceful, you can build your own path choosing the next piece of the story. Discover all tales variations and complete the library of journeys by living those drops of adventures in a medieval environment.

name: Argonauts Agency: Chair of Hephaestus
description: Argonauts Agency—See how a regular chair can be the beginning of a whole investigation and amazing adventure!

name: Blown Away
description: Blown Away is a puzzle platformer that lets you explore the world of Yhorba. Let Mylo take you on an adventure and help him solve puzzles and save the island. In these puzzles you need to find certain parts that will help Mylo and the island of Yhorba to restore peace. Are you in for a new journey?

name: Twins Edge: Back and Forth
description: This is a game which the players can control the main character to push the box. Push the box to the designated area to pass the level.

name: Kakureza Library
description: This is a librarian adventure game. As a new employee of the library, you will lend at the counter. The story branches by selecting the book that the user wants from all 260 books. Multi-ending with multiple bad ends.

name: Amazin' George 2
description: amazin' George 2 is a colourful, stunning 3D HD JRPG Style, turn based RPG featuring the Spacefarer cat, George. Help him rescue his Master from King Rattie and restore the dreamworld of Felina! With huge labyrinths and a gorgeous world to explore, amazin' George 2 is a definitive RPG experience!

name: Idle Sand Castle
description: Build the castle of your dreams

name: Laboratory
description: Defeat lab mutations in this action-platformer pixel-art game. Every mutation will challenge your skills on your way to victory, and each mutation you win will grant you a valuable upgrade for the next one.

name: Achromira
description: Achromira is a story rich platformer where Mira, the character you play as, has to search for all the crystal shards in order to restore colour to her own world and that of others. Follow her on her journey to rescue three unique worlds, Achrome City, Rutate and Gryd.

name: Spunner
description: Defend yourself from drones and alien creatures in this endless runner, first person shooter game on an alien environment! Collect in game currency to upgrade your weapons to survive!

name: Invention 3
description: In this game you have to fight your way through hordes of zombies in search of a safe place.

name: Far Far Away From Here
description: Very far away - Once upon a time in the same kingdom there lived a king .. No, he did not sit all his life on his throne, he was very fond of adventure and danger. Take over the reins of the rebellious king and show the goblins who's in charge!

name: VIrus Killer
description: Virus Killer - You are the only uninfected cell in the body that quickly absorbs a dangerous virus. Destroy all the infection in this explosive sidescroller shooter and save your host's body from complete extinction ..

name: Size It
description: Size It is an action puzzle game that will send you to help a mad scientist who created a device to resize his body.

name: Save Billy
description: Save Billy is a colorful and enjoyable side-scrolling platformer. Pirates kidnapped K., Bv. buheire of our hero Ronald, help him save her.

name: Racing Outlaws
description: Best Drag n Drift Car Racing Games Quench your thirst for unruly racing , release your stress while you dash destroy and crash the objects on the road as you race along the most realistic racing tracks with most furious competitors.

name: Super Rhythm Duel
description: Beat 'em like a Drummer!

name: Be Vigilant!
description: Be Vigilant! is a co-op top down post apocalyptic action RPG. The imperial soldiers are marching across the land taking people and resources at will. They made a big mistake when they destroyed New Hope, your home town. Use vehicles, find loot, fight enemies, all while increasing your characters skills.

name: Hidden Deep
description: Hidden Deep is 2D action & exploration sci-fi thriller game (for PC) where you command group of explorers deep under the ocean floor to find out what happened to previous expedition to which contact has been lost. As they go deeper and deeper, they discover strange structures and deadly unknown organisms.

name: Hard Driven
description: Medium / large-feeling metal sci-fi playground with Makkon3 textures. "Big Boy is defragging his hard drive. He must be stopped."

name: ZxZ
description: Sin descripción

name: You Will Return
description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Future Avoid
description: Sin descripción

name: Explore the Grotto
description: Sin descripción

name: Don't Smash into Obstacles
description: Sin descripción

name: Assemblio
description: Assemblio is a factory automation game for the WASM-4 fantasy game console. It is written in Zig and obviously highly inspired by the great Factorio and shapez.io.

name: Pl¢tfarmer
description: Sin descripción

name: Rolly Dango
description: Sin descripción

name: Sokoban
description: Sin descripción

name: Antcopter
description: Sin descripción

name: Currents
description:
Currents is a puzzle game about guiding ships on the open ocean.
Dodge rocks, swing on whirlpools, and outrun pirates, using only ocean currents!
And for added challenge, try to complete each level under par!

name: Konna
description: A game made for the 41st Godot Wild Jam.

name: Olive's Art-Venture
description: Olive's Art-Venture is a spell-slinging arena and mobbing game. Use the paper on the right side of the screen to draw shapes which then cast spells, damaging enemies and protecting you.

name: PixelQuiz
description: PixelQuiz is a game where the player is shown a pixel-art image generated by AI / machine learning and they must guess what game, movie, etc.

name: Zippy the Circle Challenge: Level 3C and Level 4C
description: Sin descripción

name: Baseball: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade - 2 Player Cooperation Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Macs World
description: Mac's World is a single-player 3D adventure game in which a young pup explores the many floors of a mysterious mansion on a quest to collect as many chicken legs as he can. Traverse 10 unique levels while dodging bombs, solving puzzles, and smacking enemies away with a trusty frying pan. But be careful, as unknown dangers lurk around each corner of the mansion. Is there a haunting afoot? Mac, along with his trusty animal sidekick, will have to face their fears to find out.

name: La-Mulana 2: The Tower of Oannes
description: The first piece of downloadable content for La-Mulana 2, the newly-added map – The Tower of Oannes. Ranks with the previous instalment’s Hell Temple in difficulty, acting as an optional distraction from the main journey, filled with brutal level design and humour akin to a Masocore title.

name: Imperium Revolution
description: Imperium Revolution gives you the ability to capture and train over 200 Imperators and enjoy action-packed battles. Master the fast-paced turn-based strategic combat system and make sure you are always one move ahead of your opponent in order to achieve victory. Meet other Guardians of Everwinter in an all-new Imperium Battle Arena. Fight against other formidable Guardians for the opportunity to claim your rank among the Legendary Guardians.

name: Parking Simulator
description: The parking situation in vehicle simulator will require you to show top driving skills in steering, acceleration and obstacle avoidance to get those vehicles parked in parking places. As the parking lot driver, you will drive the awesome automobile around corners, obstacles, and parking lot borders with speed and accuracy. Learn how to navigate in realistic parking environment. Steer the vehicle meticulously and catch the bridge in time to lift your car onto the next story. Use the varying gears and shifts to wiggle into the parking spot. Avoid crashing into barriers and other cars! This is quite the challenge. Follow the checkpoints to find your way ad become parking master!

name: Venatio
description: Venatio is a multiplayer horror-action game up to 4 players versus 1 monster. Monster and all players controlled by human players. You can create both action and horror elements, it is totally up to you.

name: Road Cards
description: A hitchhiker simulator and a card game? Easy!

name: Cave Crawler
description: Cave Crawler is a short, 2D side-scrolling action platformer. Explore caves filled with interesting enemies and fun platforming challenges.

name: Mission: Santa
description: Mission: Santa is a 2D platformer starring a beloved magical character. Avoid evil snowmen and gather cookies across 20 levels!

name: Crown Claimer
description: Defend your crown at all costs.

name: Unreal Element World
description: Unreal Element World is a Roguelike overlook game;

name: Sex Adventures: The Secret Club
description: A visual novel about a young woman who goes out on a wild and unexpected night in a mysterious sex nightclub.

name: Akashic Migraine
description:
"Akashic Migraine" is a misshapen, awkward, and unfriendly map i put together as a break from work on time tripper. it's exhausting making detailed, pretty, and generally accessible things all the time, especially when my tastes lean the other way.

there's a reasonable amo﻿unt of platforming (all of it can be done with running once you work out the angles, don't feel bad about taking it slow or savescumming those bits though) and the combat ramps up quickly from "this is kind of awkward" to "this is kind of awkward light slaughter". generally speaking i configured it to be just enough of a challenge to me.

name: Widiland
description: Like a miniature farm, you will play the role of the residents on Widi Planet and experience 3 specialized jobs: Farmer, Breeder and Cook. A series of exciting activities in the game for you to experience to the fullest: Cultivating, Breeding, Cooking, Collecting items, Completing orders, Doing daily quests, Gaining achievement. Through these above activities, you can receive EXP to unlock many new features.

name: Before Dawn
description:
You've arrived for your apprenticeship at a island where you will live and work for a old lighthouse keeper and experienced sailor.

He says most men don't make it before dawn comes and they've all quit due to the isolation here and atmosphere driving most people insane.

name: Jackal Squad: Classic Shooting
description: World War II broke out, the Fascists attacked the Allies. Your brothers in arms are hostages behind enemy lines. The Jackal squad has been given a mission to drive an armed jeep into hostile territory in order to rescue and extract prisoners of war. As a soldier of an elite group that has undergone a harsh training regiment to survive in any environment, can you complete this mission and put an end to the war?

name: Worldle
description:
Guess the Worldle in 6 guesses.
Each guess must be a valid country, territory, ...
After each guess, you will have the distance, the direction and the proximity from your guess and the target country.

name: Mr. Bommels Teacats
description: Sin descripción

name: Sex With Hitler
description: Sex With Hitler is a unique blend of visual novel and top-down shooter. You will fight in the fields of World War II and meet five unique heroines, among whom you will find both friends and enemies.

name: DonutRun
description: DonutRun is a runner style arcade game where the user leaps and dashes through obstacles to get to the finish line. Play and survive through 12 levels of as you complete your quest as a Pink Frosted Donut.

name: Yufo
description: Yufo's planet got drunk, so now they're stuck in limbo-verse, waiting till things improve at home. Another creature lives in limbo-verse, with the ability to either ensure its safety, or its demise. Let's hope the creature is kind...

name: Vestige
description: Vestige is a third-person Action Platformer student-made game in which you play as a small adventurer, eager to uncover forgotten secrets. Jump and dash through various challenges and experience an exciting and fast-paced combat against a variety of enemies.

name: Magic Code
description: Magic code is a programming puzzle game, the game uses game mechanics firmly rooted in programming concepts. The game allows players to get a practical understanding of the basic concepts such as the sequence of instructions, procedures and cycles, learn the basics and logic of programming. The Magic code game has been designed for adults and children. Play by yourself or with your children, create levels for yourself, your children, friends and people from all over the world. Magic code - has 50 levels for teenagers and adults, and 50 levels for children, but that's not all, create your own exciting and challenging levels in the level editor, and share them with other people. For parents: Magic Code helps a child to develop creative abilities. A child, trying to find a mistake in his program, develops intelligence and logic, and concentrating on the task - attention and discipline. Teach kids the basics of coding through an exciting adventure, solving simple and complex puzzles. The child will learn how to break down a large task into small fragments, find similarities in different elements, identify and eliminate insignificant details, build fragments into a single algorithm to get the result.

name: Ghost Party Nyanbaba
description: Lovely find hidden items game! Investigate strange hidden objects to prevent nyambaba's illusion from succeeding. Please find all hidden points within the time, otherwise the villain nyanbaba will jump out and frighten the players with a very cute Chinese voice!

name: Re: Summon
description: Form Contracts with monsters and become The Paragon Summoner!

name: Ufotofu: Hex
description: Ufotofu: Hex is a zen match puzzler where you create palindrome chains on a hexagonal grid, giving you even more directions to trace your path than a traditional puzzle matching game. With charming sound and colourblind-friendly visuals, take your time creating the longest chains to maximise points.

name: Menimals
description: Fight, train, and travel with the Menimals you befriend, in Menimals! This fantasy strategy game has 50 unique characters, hundreds of single player battles, and real-time multiplayer. With no ads or in-app purchases, you won’t want to miss Menimals!

name: Pirates on Target
description: Move the blocks strategically, your objective is to change the trajectory of the cannonballs until they reach the pirate ship. Simple yet challenging.

name: After Dark VR
description: After Dark is a VR online co-op survival horror where you play as either a Hunter on the hunt to strike down your next victim or as Survivors working together to stay alive and escape.

name: Hammer Kid
description: The terrible "Szymon Spitfire" sends his armada of monsters to the small village of "Vivid Island". Of all things, a little boy, armed only with a hammer, is the only one brave enough to stand up to the evil. Use the power of your hammer as you travel to four mystical lands. In 40 huge levels you will encounter dozens of enemies and dangerous bosses. Collect precious green and red jewels, explore the world and discover secrets. Oh, and did I mention the really great soundtrack, inspired by the glorious sound of the 8- and 16-bit console era? The retro game you've been waiting for. Are you ready for a fantastic adventure?

name: Duloga
description: a reverse space shooter where you choose who lives and dies. can you survive 7 nights?

name: Dogs and Pigs
description: “Dogs and pigs” is a word that immediately shows how Korean game companies treat their customers. You decide to hack into the computer of the famous gaming company NNN for revenge. You decide to go directly to the company and plug in the USB containing the virus for the most reliable hacking.

name: The Sheep P
description: The clicking adventure you and your friends need. Collect wool with the main hero of the game The Sheep P. Collect all wool in the world!

name: Empire of Ember
description: Empire of Ember is an action RPG and strategy game. You play as a Lightbringer, a young wizard who just inherited rule over a destroyed city. You have to rebuild it to its former glory while you live adventures in first-person, dual-wielding steel and magic, exploring procedurally generated dungeons and leading your troops to clashes of up to 100 units. You can customize your city to its finest details with a 3D city-builder, and then upload it for other players to explore and siege.

name: SubDivide
description: Divide the world in this puzzle-platformer to venture into the unknown.

name: Sword Reverie
description: Sword Reverie is a JRPG inspired VR action game. Sword Reverie gives players a rich fantasy world to explore and a unique combat system where players use body motions to launch abilities.

name: I Klopi tou Krasiou
description: When the carnival of Potamia is once more up against conditions of sabotage, Nionios, the carnival mascot will have to save the day, with the help of the association, and this year with yours as well!

name: RiiPlay
description: Sin descripción

name: Jigsaw Novel: Public Toilet Sex
description: Jane decides to dress in a provocative way and look for casual sex in a public toilet.

name: Rapidfire 3
description: A Set of 6 Limit Removing Levels where the aim was to make One Map per day, during my time being quarantined at home.

name: My Therapist is a Futanari
description: It feels like your life isn't going anywhere--like there's some kind of mental block. You take the first step towards making an improvement and set up an appointment with a therapist in your local area.

name: We Are Out of Food, Milton.
description: "We Are Out of Food, Milton." is a visual novel/walking sim about having to go to the grocery store even though you really don't want to.

name: Dark Paradise Nigelopia: Mini Mix
description: A 2D action game that takes place in the Dark Paradise of Nigelopia, where girls are large and in charge! The guys are pretty cool too, but the big butt is the ULTIMATE weapon! Also there’s an optional Fart Mode, which gets very noisy! Zip across the colorful Dark Domains to take on your opponents!

name: Dr. Chatelet: Faith
description: Amputations, bloodletting, alchemy - all of which seem unthinkable today - were the treatment options that medieval doctors revered. You must face challenges one after another and experience gains and losses in the course of your constant adventures

name: Nickelodeon Extreme Tennis
description: Join your favorite iconic characters from Nickelodeon shows past and present as they compete in the most Extreme Tennis Matches EVER! All your favorite retro Nicktoons come together for the ultimate tennis showdown: SpongeBob, Angelica, Rocko, Garfield, and more!

name: Wing Fighter
description:
Wing Fighter is an free classic arcade online shooting game, with epic 3D realistic scene, gorgeous and fascinating combat effects and variety of unique bosses and equipment. If you loved arcade shooting games as a kid, this retro, vintage game blend modern combat styles would be the perfect game for you!

In every battle of Wing Fighter, You will become an air force pilot, controlling different fighters to fight evil enemies and bosses. It is your mission to defeat them and protect the safety and freedom of the skies！Enemies have invaded, the battle is on the verge of breaking out, come on and start this thrilling combat flight action game now!

name: Dordle
description: wordle plus wordle

name: Forbidden Fruit
description: This is a story about brother and sister seeking their missing father on a mysterious island. Adventure awaits you in tropical lands full of secrets! You’ll make new friends, learn new things and battle many different enemies. Forbidden island is waiting for you.

name: Mirror 2: Project X
description: You are an agent in the Federal Bureau of Research and Protection (FBRP). Your job is to protect mankind from various supernatural objects and events. As the player, you will enter a vast, complex, and diverse world that provides an entirely new experience. Know that every choice will affect the story's conclusion.

name: Pure Mini Golf
description: Enjoy over 50 unique levels, each with its own set of obstacles, twists, and turns. Its simple controls make it a snap to learn from the outset and through its three modes, you’ll soon go from fledgling to master putter. Arcade mode takes you through the game’s levels where you can play at your own pace. Once you’re feeling more confident in your skills, you can take on Challenge mode where failing at any time takes you back to the beginning. And when you’re done playing alone, you can bring in up to three friends for some Local Multiplayer and chill. The putting life is a simple one. Bring it into your home with Pure Mini Golf.

name: Little Mouse's Encyclopedia + Under Leaves
description: Little Mouse's Encyclopedia is ideal for born explorers. Wandering around the lively boards, you’ll find animals and plants by yourself. Using a magnifying glass, you can reveal cards that contain interesting information and drawings. GORGEOUS ILLUSTRATIONS The graphic style of Little Mouse's Encyclopedia was inspired by classic fairy tales and... children's encyclopedias. This enchanting and original style makes the exploration even more enjoyable, and various animations breathe life into the surroundings. While playing, listen to pleasant, relaxing music and the sounds of nature, such as birds chirping or frog toad. EXPLORE THE WORLD With a brave mouse, you’ll explore the area around its burrow, walk through the forest, sneak through the garden and swim in the pond. In each of these places, unique species of animals and plants await you. During your wandering, you’ll come across over 160 unique species, about which you can learn something interesting.

name: Trigonal
description: Trigonal is a simple puzzle game where you need to fill a line to clear it out and gain some points. How you clear the line is your choice as you can clear it by fill a row horizontal, vertical or diagonal. To mix up the fun there three different game modes.

name: Football Killer
description: Have you ever dreamed of being a professional footballer? Soccer is the source of your vital energy? Do you realize, that in reality, it's a deadly game? The other footballers, referees, bodyguards, or even supporters just waiting to make you suffer! Because they know. They know about your past. And they are scared. Show them that they aren’t wrong in this new arcade – puzzle game. In Football Killer cool different levels are waitings for you to play – you can show the strength of your ball shooting with the ability to kill enemies in one shot. But not the referee – he is untouchable… Clever guy… This logic game requires you not just brainless killing, but to make smart decisions. If you like cool shooters we are glad – enemies are equipped with the whole arsenal, so shooting to people will be necessary – but there are no bullets, only your ball. This offline shooter contains explosive materials, trampolines, and many, much more obstacles.

name: Shadow Quest
description: Shadow Quest is a game where you are exploring massive shadowland with the hope of getting out alive. There are lots of things you can find in there, from powerful enemies to countless money. But be aware, you might not be able to come out from that place. Grab Shadow Quest right now and engage yourself in the most exciting and rewarding game experience!

name: Chef Word Ardee
description: Bon Appetit! Join Chef Word Ardee in helping him find and put together letters to form words. Lots of word puzzles to play, find hidden words and earn hints to help you solve the puzzle.

name: NeuraGun
description: NeuraGun is a first-person science fiction puzzle game. The player will have to go through a maze of mysteries that will lead him out of the tangled scientific complex.

name: Wars and Roses
description: One-of-a-kind intense tactical FPS where you fight battles alongside female officers and interact with those beauties in a 3D dating sim. Rescue captured officers, gain affection by dating in various scenarios to unlock unique interactions, and fight side-by-side on an anti-terrorism campaign.

name: Walk with the Living
description: Walk with the Living is a strategy role-playing game with visual novel elements taking influence from series like Fire Emblem.

name: Rapture: The Beginning
description: Rapture: The Beginning is an atmospheric adventure puzzle game in which you play as a famous archeologist and explorer who is venturing through an ancient temple in the desert, using his skills to overcome the traps, enemies and all obstacles in his way in search for the great ancient treasure

name: Menu Please!
description: You know you're a top class Chef, but are you ready to prove it? Show off your Cooking Skills, manage your Resources and Cook in huge Restaurants.

name: Stairway to Heaven's Gate
description: A thrilling parkour game where you play as a lost soul. your mission is keep climbing up, and run up the stairway to heaven before you disperse and disappear. Single player or two local players.

name: Greedy Corgi
description: A lovely puzzle game combining greedy snakes and pushing boxes. Move through the WSAD / direction key on the keyboard or the left rocker of the handle, and return through the R key on the keyboard or the B key on the handle. Lead the lovely corky to eat more meat!

name: Lastone: Behind the Choice
description: A point & click visual novel puzzle game where players fight against other characters in a game. Discover and progress stories of playable characters from varied backgrounds by winning, and decide their fate after knowing their stories.

name: GwenBlade
description: Jump into a mind full of devastating emotions and fight them with the power of music! You either fight reflecting yourself in a roguelike-style Emotional abyss or move on to new episodes of Jane's story.

name: Cat Adventure
description: Cat Adventure is a side scrolling game. In the game you will find the most difficult levels and the most dangerous traps!!! If you like challenging and colorful platformers, then don't pass up this game. Playing as a funny cat, you have to go through many interesting and difficult levels!

name: Adventures Nearby
description: "Adventures Nearby" is a classic side-scrolling 2D platformer with pixel graphics. Adventurer and fruit lover is in a hurry to find adventures, help him go through all the challenges and collect all fruits.

name: Porcelana
description: Porcelana is an indie visual novel.

name: Synchronizacja
description: The first chapter of the Polish game Visual Novel. Enter the world of Synchronization and discover its secrets.

name: A Maze Fox
description: Help this sympathetic Fox Mother find her cubs that got lost in the icy mountain! solve puzzles that mix mechanics of the classics sokobans games!

name: Zodiacats
description: Follow cat Catherine on her journey for the lost astrology papyri and learn more about her job as a witch assistant for bringing good vibes into this Earth! Let Catherine guide you through the zodiac wheel, showing you about features of each solar sign. You can also learn about your cat's sign!

name: Doge Dimensions
description: Blast through the Doge Dimensions and explore the multiverse in this open world adventure. Fly, dash, and defy gravity as you discover unknown terrain and take on a variety of challenges.

name: Phlegethon
description: Make your way through this hellish dimension. Destroy all monsters, crush their skulls. -Old school shooter with 90's style graphics. -A wide variety of monsters. -Decent arsenal of powerful weapons. -Gloomy atmosphere.

name: Dungeons of Shalnor
